snippet.title: EDDA Cafe Visual Novel - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
"Have you heard a myth about a cafe that can turn back time?”

Mina has been struggling to move on from the past that has haunted her for the past two years. She lost someone dear to her and blames herself for it. And now, just two days before Valentine's Day, she stumbles upon a mysterious little cafe named EDDA. Curiosity and her friend's persuasion compel her to enter, only to discover that through the magic within the cafe, she is given a second chance.

Will it save her heart? Will she move forward or stay in the past?

“When the coffee starts to drip, the magic begins...”
__________________________________________________

EDDA Cafe is a short visual novel made by Mushroomallow for Valentine VN Jam 2021. The game is available for FREE in Itch.io and Google Play.

https://mushroomallow.itch.io/edda-cafe
__________________________________________________

Follow us on twitter for updates and future announcements!
https://twitter.com/mushroomallow_
